title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct research on bioluminescent organisms, existing street lighting systems, and relevant regulations. Identify stakeholders and gather their requirements.

title: System Architecture Design for BioLuminescent Street Lights (Revised)
description: Revised design of the overall system architecture for the BioLuminescent Street Lighting System. This includes detailed design of bioluminescent organism enclosures, lighting distribution systems, control systems, and integration with existing infrastructure. Factors to consider include scalability, maintainability, security, environmental impact, safety measures, regulatory compliance, maintenance requirements, potential challenges and solutions in each area, edge cases, and failure scenarios, communication protocol between the bioluminescent organisms and the control system, and a focus on energy efficiency and sustainability. Consideration of edge cases and failure scenarios is encouraged.

title: Organism Engineering and Cultivation
description: Research and develop engineered bioluminescent organisms suitable for street lighting applications. Establish cultivation and maintenance processes.

title: Enclosure Design and Manufacturing (Revised)
description:
Task for the design and development of enclosures to house the bioluminescent organisms. This task emphasizes the need for interdisciplinary collaboration between hardware engineers, material scientists, design specialists, biologists (for bioluminescent organism-related aspects), and project managers. The revised description includes a comprehensive design phase to accommodate all requirements and constraints, considering proper lighting distribution, environmental control, maintenance access, safety considerations, durability, weather resistance, easy installation and maintenance, compliance with relevant regulations and standards. The revised task will be further broken down into subtasks by the task-decomposer for efficient execution. 

The task dependencies remain unchanged.

To ensure thoroughness and efficiency, it would be beneficial to include a software engineer to handle any necessary automation or control systems within the enclosures. Also, consider adding a safety engineer to address potential hazards in the design and manufacturing process.

Task state is changed to 'DECOMPOSE'.

title: Control Systems Development
description: Develop software and hardware components for monitoring and controlling the bioluminescent street lighting system, including remote management and integration with existing infrastructure.

title: User Interface and Visualization
description: Design and develop user interfaces and data visualization tools for monitoring and managing the bioluminescent street lighting system.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures to protect the system from unauthorized access and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and procedures to ensure the system meets all requirements and functions as expected under various conditions.

title: Deployment and Integration
description: Plan and execute the deployment of the bioluminescent street lighting system, including integration with existing infrastructure and migration strategies.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, user manuals, and training materials for system operation, maintenance, and troubleshooting.
